Layer.TextHelpCommand:
%function(self) local text = ''
text = text ..'Help:
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'Up/Down
' text = text ..'Change Beat
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'Left/Right
' text = text ..'Change Snap
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'1/2/3/4
' text = text ..'Add/Remove Tap Note
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'1/2/3/4 Holded
' text = text ..'Add Hold Note
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'Space Bar
' text = text ..'Set Area Marker
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'Enter
' text = text ..'Area Menu
' text = text ..'
' text = text ..'ESC
' text = text ..'Main Menu
'
self:settext( text ) end

Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:x(SCREEN_RIGHT-15) self:y(SCREEN_BOTTOM-15) self:horizalign('right') self:vertalign('bottom') self:zoom(0.3); self:diffuse(0.5,0.5,0.5,1) if FUCK_EXE then self:settext( 'DWI - NotITG Version
V'.. DWIVersion() ..' - '.. DWIVerDate() ) self:diffuse(0.5,0.75,0.5,1) elseif OPENITG then self:settext( 'DWI - OpenITG Version
V'.. DWIVersion() ..' - '.. DWIVerDate() ) self:diffuse(0.75,0.5,0.5,1) else self:settext( 'DWI - SM (UNSTABLE) Version
V'.. DWIVersion() ..' - '.. DWIVerDate() ) self:diffuse(0.5,0.5,0.5,1) end end
